RuntimeErrorAnalysis.Summary: Table or view does not exist for Oracle
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SampleLogOutput: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [select name from customers where id = 1]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00942: table or view does not exist
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.RegExpPattern: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar \[(.*)\]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00942: table or view does not exist
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.ProblemDetailHtml: A table or view specified in the SQL statement '$1' does not exist
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SolutionDetailHtml: Check the table and view names specified against the database schema
